des:
Aqara offers the most comprehensive voice-controlled smart home experience with the Aqara Home Skill and Alexa. Control your home lighting and other devices hands free. 

To take full advantage of these features, you need an Alexa-enabled Aqara smart device with your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV (any generation), Fire TV stick (2nd generation), Fire TV Edition smart TVs, or Fire Tablets (generation 7th & above).

To get started, please make sure that your Aqara smart device is set up and turned on.

Ask Amazon Alexa to enable the Aqara Home skill – “Alexa, enable Aqara Home skill” to get instructions in your Alexa app to link your Aqara Home account with your Alexa account.

OR

In the Alexa app, search for the Aqara Home Skill. Select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your Aqara Home account with your Alexa account.
Now, you can start using the Aqara Home skill.

OR

In the Aqara Home App - "Profile" - "Smart Speaker" - "Alexa", bind on the Amazon account.


Now try out some commands, using the name of the Aqara smart device, such as plug, door and window sensors that you created when you set up your device. For example:

“Alexa, turn on plug.“
“Alexa, turn off plug.”
“Alexa, is door open?”
